plot: A young boy creates his own robot, who magically comes to life and shares the adventures and joys of youth with him. Though as the boy grows up, his attention is drawn elsewhere and the robot is left lonely in the wake of this.
title: Robot
plot_es: A young boy creates his own robot, who magically comes to life and shares the adventures and joys of youth with him. Though as the boy grows up, his attention is drawn elsewhere and the robot is left lonely in the wake of this.
plot_en: A young boy creates his own robot, who magically comes to life and shares the adventures and joys of youth with him. Though as the boy grows up, his attention is drawn elsewhere and the robot is left lonely in the wake of this.
